feed.title: SAP Community - ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model
feed.subtitle: ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: RAP: Which Activity (ACTVT) should be used in Access Control for Access Category "Value Help/F4"
entry.content:
Hi all,

in an Authorization Object in ABAP Cloud the Activities are mapped to one of the three Categories "Read", "Write", "Value Help".

The Categories are used in Business catalogs (where "Value Help" is labeled as "F4"), Role/Role Template Assignments, etc.

For Activities there are standard values (see eg onpremise in tables acl_actvt/acl_actvtt): 01 for Create, 02 for Change, 03 for Display, 08 for Delete

03 maps to Access Category Read

01,  02, 08 maps to Write

But there is no obvious activity value for Access Category "Value Help".

What activity do you use for Value Help?

Thanks for suggestions, pointers to documentation, tutorials, etc!

Regards,

  Wolfgang

entry.title: Error RAP_DSP_REQUEST009 in draft enabled Odata 4 Fiori app
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We have created a custom Fiori element app which is based on RAP and uses Odata V4 protocol.

This is managed scenario implementation with unmanaged save. 

ETag and Lock master is used in the Behaviour definition.

But sometimes users get the message "Edit not possible: locking of entity &1 failed" ( RAP_DSP_REQUEST009 )

This is not happen all the times but only occusionally. 
Could anyone please provide any hint what could be the reason behind the issue and how to solve this.

Following is the snippet of behaviour definition.

entry.title: SAP Fiori Rap - Dynamic value help based on another table field via CDS/Annotations?
entry.content:
Hi all - I have created a Fiori RAP application based on a DB table where user can create/delete/update table entries. I am working on creating input helps for certain table fields. 

Is it possible to dynamically create a value help field based on the value of another table field via pure RAP CDS/annotations? For example, In column A, the search help for the field will present two options (VKORG and ZTEST). In column B, depending on what was selected in Column A, will determine the search help values. If user adds an entry for VKORG, then in column B the search help will be composed of different sales orgs. If user selects ZTEST, then the search help in column B will contain other options pertaining to ZTEST. 

Column AColumn B 
VKORG0001
ZTEST0123

 


__PRESENT

entry.title: Method abcd__GET_ENTITYSET is not implemented- Calling RFC FM
entry.content:
Hi ,

I am calling a RFC function module in my gateway project. My RFC Fm returns just one line of data (XML String ) in an export parameter.

I Created data model by import->RFC and in the service implementation getEntity I did Map to data Source.

Now When I execute my request

/sap/opu/odata/sap/ZSD_XXXX_XXXX_READ_SRV/InputParamSet?$format=json

 

I get 501 error saying " "value" : "Method 'INPUTPARAMSET_GET_ENTITYSET' not implemented in data provider class"

entry.content:
Hi!

Thanks!

entry.title: F4 value help for a field Determined by another field in RAP ABAP
entry.content:
Hi All , 

I have an RAP Application, displaying records . if i select multiple records from list report and click on custom button , it opens up a pop up having 2 fields ( 1st field - which  field will be updated in all selected records , 2nd filed - what would be the new value to be updated ) .
I have handled the pop up display with Abstract Entity .( having 2 fields , FLD1 , FLD2 ). In AB entity the FLD1 has attached with a F4 which will give me the list of fields  to choose which field to be changed in records, FLD2 will hold the new Value ) .

for ex- if in Pop up , FLD1 ( has values like Name, Age, Date,Gender,status  ) , and i select  FLD1 = Age and then in FLD2  = 50 then , Age field will be updated as 50 in all selected records in list . This is working fine .  

However i want to provide a Calendar  as F4 help in FLD2 when user selects FLD1 = Date . 

Example : FLD1 can have values  like Name, Age, Date, Gender, status  etc . so                             When FLD1 = AGE , then FLD2 = normal input field , but when FLD1 = DATE , then i want to add a F4 of calendar to FLD2 .  

Is there a way to handle this ?? In runtime i can get the value for FLD1 to know if its Date field or normal field . If its Date field, how to add a Calender as F4 to the FLD2 . 

Any Suggestions ??

entry.title: RAP BO for existing CDS views vs. Custom Entity
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

My idea is to build a Fiori Elements application that displays data from existing CDS views, like EnterpriseProject and JournalEntry. I wanted to ask, what, in your opinion, would be the most correct way forward - creating new custom Root view (and a behavior definition for it) based on standard CDS view (like I_EnterpriseProject) or rather defining Custom Entity and then defining an unmanaged behavior definition for it?

My thought process is that - if standard CDS views are (re)used, it takes care of query functionality and I won't need to implement the query class to fetch the data.

What is your experience in building such apps? I would appreciate any feedback.

Regards,

Ilja.

entry.title: RAP - Managed with Unmanaged Save
entry.content:
I know RAP supports Managed with Unmanaged Save scenarios, but in our case we seem to need the opposite.

Our main table is the standard Equipment Master which has to be updated using BAPIs, and we need to create a log table Z_AUDIT to log any changes made to the standard Equipment. So the main entity is the standard I_Equipment, and the new associated z entity is ZI_Equipment_Audit. 

How would you model the RAP root entry view?

define root view entity ZI_Equipment_Audit as 
  select from I_Equipment as Equip
    composition [1..*] of ZI_Audit as _Audit

We need a Managed behaviour for the Audit entity and Unmanaged for the root I_Equipment, because BAPI's are needed to update the standard Equipment master tables. That is not supported by RAP.

What would you suggest in this case?

Thanks

entry.title: Create entity of different Business Object from action in dev extension of Manage Sales Order V2
entry.content:
Hello,

I’m working on an extension for Manage Sales Orders V2. This standard application is unmanaged without draft.

I’m trying to create an application which can receive the information that the user has already entered in Manage SO through an action in Manage SO. I will implement another action which fetches the data from the custom app in the Manage SO app.

If the sales order already exists it’s not a problem since you can read it with EML from the new app. If the order hasn’t been created yet, it’s only possible to work with it in local mode which is not possible from the behaviour of my BO.

My approach so far:

For example, if I just want to transfer Sold-to party and Sales Order Type

  • Create table with the following fields: (key) GUID, (not key) Sales order number, Sales order type, Sold-to party
  • Create append structure to VBAK with GUID which will include the GUID of the draft
  • Add the newly created GUID fields in VBAK to all the layers of the I_ R_ and C_SALESORDERMANAGE
  • Create CDS Views, managed behavior, service etc for the custom app
  • Create a custom action in Manage SO which does a Create entity (I tried both in in draft mode and not) on my custom BO. Take the generated GUID from the Mapped structure of the Create statement and write it into the append structure of VBAK through EML on R_SALESORDERTP in the implementation of the action.

The result is that if the Sales Order already exists, I get the newly created GUID in the mapped structure of my “Create” operation in the action and I can see it in the custom app. If the action doesn’t exist, the Create statement still runs, gives back a GUID in the mapped structure but the new entry isn’t written into the custom draft table of the custom BO until the new SO has been saved.

This seems inconsistent. Why would the mapped structure give me the expected GUID but the entity not actually be created?

As a sidenote, I thought about implementing my new functionality through node extension to be able to use "in local mode" instead of custom application, but the Manage Sales Order behavior doesn’t have the @allowNewCompositions: true annotation.

Has anyone run into something similar? I’m also open to different approaches to moving data between apps if it’s only available “in local mode”.

All the best,

Ben

entry.title: SAP Fiori not calling Odata. RAP Preview working fine
entry.content:
Hi,

In my current project, I’m developing a SAP Fiori app using Visual Studio Code. However, the main challenge is that VS Code isn’t connected to the SAP backend. To work around this, I’m downloading an existing app using the standard program /UI5/UI5_REPOSITORY_LOAD, making the necessary changes locally, and then uploading it back to the SAP backend using the same program. This process creates a BSP application.

The backend OData service has been generated using RAP. When I preview the service binding in Eclipse, everything works perfectly—the OData call is successful, and the view is rendered correctly. 

The Network tab in the Edge browser’s Developer Tools confirms this, as shown in the screenshot. No issues so far.

To replicate this behavior in my standalone Fiori app, I checked the source in the app preview to identify the URI being called.

I then used this exact URI in the manifest.json file of my app in VS Code. The screenshot below shows the manifest.json from my standalone VS Code project.

However, when I test the app using SE80 (by right-clicking and selecting Test in SAPGUI after uploading), the OData service isn’t being called, and the view isn’t generated. The screen remains blank. The Network tab in Edge shows no OData activity, and although the Console logs some generic errors, they also appear in other working apps.

I’ve checked all the usual places for errors—/IWFND/ERROR_LOG, ST22, SLG1, and SU53—but found nothing relevant.

Network in Developer tool of the Edge browser doesn't show any Odata call.

Console shows some error, but these are generic error which I can see in other apps as well which are working just fine.

I’m stuck at this point and would really appreciate any guidance on what might be going wrong or what else I can check.

Thanks,

entry.title: RAP based Fiori - Issue in downloading excel with deep structures
entry.content:
We are creating a smart table with fiori using RAP approach where data is being sent from backend to fiori using a custom entity and a query provider class. This smart table has a quick view where some data is displayed. Now, when we try to download excel using standard excel button, it calculates lacs of record by multiplying with the records of quick view and hence considering it a deep structure and fails to download excel.

Has anyone worked in downloading excel with deep structure in RAP based fiori smart table?

entry.title: Table maintenance alternatives in S/4HANA on premise
entry.content:
Hi,

We are working on defining best practice guidelines for creating maintenance objects in S/4HANA on promise. Depending on complexity, there seem to be a few options:

  • Using a simple Table Maintenance View from GUI with a Fiori Launchpad tile .
  • Using the Fiori app “Custom Business Objects”, which generates a BOPF object in the background.
  • Creating a ‘Maintenance Object’ from Eclipse, which generates a RAP-based solution.

Since SAP provides the Custom Business Objects app, it could be a valid option, but RAP is the strategic direction.

I would appreciate recommendations or best practices on which approach to choose for both small/simple and more complex maintenance/configuration tables. No step-by-step instructions are needed; I am primarily looking for guidance on the preferred approach.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Building RAP model with 2 tables (header and items) and having Fiori preview with Single LUW
entry.content:
I have database model having 2 Z-tables where object has header record and its items. I would like have Fiori preview app to manage both these tables so that their item lines can be added within same LUW.  

The tables and CDS views I have managed to define so, that they have dependency to each other using joins and composite and parent-child relations.

So far I have managed to generate RAP model out of my Z-tables. But it results to SAP Fiori preview, where maintenance happens on one line containing item records having repeated header data. Understand I could use annotations to get items shown on separate screen, but I understand I could not get this to work on single LUW, meaning I first create Header record (draft) and then could add items (drafts) and then save everything on same LUW, so not that header should be saved separately first before can add items to it.

I have seen blogs and videos of RAP model having annotations on other related tables with Fiori app preview for display only. But not blog with CRUD features. Or well, found one by spyvee domain but I think it was incomplete guide and I never got it working. When googling "sap btp rap two tables", Google AI lists needed actions, but I consider its guidance is also not complete. I have heard being demonstrated by SAP (not yet seen myself), that ABAP AI could do what I am looking for.

So with this question I am asking if there is (which I haven't found yet) a blog for multiple table maintenance on RAP  or someone could provide complete guidance here.

I understand there is a RAP concept (with blogs) if tables are a customizing tables (consider similar as SM30 in old SAP ERP), but in my case tables are not customizing data.

entry.title: Duplicates in draft on test tenant - public cloud
entry.content:
Hi community,

I have created a managed with draft application in the public cloud. ( list report )
I tested it on the dev tenant and then transported it to the test tenant.
The testing on the dev tenant were without errors.
On the test tenant I'm encoutering the following error:
All items that i create, get the same draft uuid. Meaning once i press go I see no data as I get a duplicate error message or if I continue with the create message, i get an page error as again, my table contains duplicates.

Duplicate error:
Failed to get contexts for /sap/opu/odata4/sap/z_billing/srvd/sap/z_billing/0001/Billinginfo with start index 0 and length 30 - Error: Duplicate key predicate: (ParentId=fa163e0b-7372-1fe0-a0fd-9f1480095443,IsActiveEntity=false)

If I look into my odata response with the dev tools, I can see all my created items, still in draft mode, with a non unique draft uuid.

I'm thinking about trying out late numbering to fix the issue, but I don't understand why the issue happens in the first place.
It works fine on the dev system.

a)Any suggestions ?

Further cloud questions related to this issue.
b)How can i delete data from my draft table from the test tenant ?
  Do i need to call an api service that can delete data or build a data managing app ?
c)If I'm not mistaken, it is not possible to look into the databases on the test tenant, correct ?

Kind regards
JT

entry.title: SAP to Non-SAP Using ODATA Service
entry.content:

I have gone through different posts and blogs, but I am finding different solutions, which is a bit confusing. Could anyone please guide me on the actual process to achieve this? A clear explanation would also be helpful for beginners like me.

Your support and guidance will be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your time and assistance.

OData ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model API, @ABAP @ABAP_abap @odata

entry.title: refresh table custom page fiori elements
entry.content:

I built a RAP fiori elements list report with a custom page as object page:

when the save button in clicked, the method save_modified in the backend is correctly called and everything works well. The problem is that I would like to make a Get call after the save because I need to refresh the UI. 

How to do this ?

Many thanks
